TestCase.TestCaseTitle: Check when new information (BSO) is added / removed from an Overlay. Update BSO after removing.
TestCase.TestCaseObjective: Verify correct exchange behaviour when a BSO is added to Overlay, removed from Overlay, and updated.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: Nation A adds a new BSO to the Overlay. Nation B receives the update information for the Overlay and displays the BSO correctly. Nation A removes the BSO from the Overlay. Nation B receives the update information for the Overlay and removes the BSO from display. Nation A updates the BSO details. Nation B does not receive the update because BSO is not covered by the topic which contains the overlay..
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: R/R, P/S.
TestCase.TestCasePreCondition: Nation A has created a topic, which includes the Overlay. Nation B has subscribed to this topic. The Overlay was already exchanged after it was created by Nation A so that it is available on both systems.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: This test is considered a success if the updates are display correctly on both Nationsâ€™ C2IS.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A adds a new BSOto the Overlay
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation B receives the update and displays the BSO correctly.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A removes the BSO from the Overlay.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation B receives the update and removes the BSO from the Overlay display.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A updates the BSO details.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation B does not receive the update because the BSO is not part of the topic subscribed by Nation B.
